Jo Peninsulas 7:12 AM
Hi Samuel,

Thank you for your enthusiasm and interest in Earth Day 2023! Here are the details:

1. Earth Day 2023 is a global event that will take place on April 22, 2023.
2. The event will be a combination of in-person and virtual activities to ensure the highest level of participation and engagement worldwide.
3. The main focus will be on tree planting, clean energy initiatives, and spreading awareness about environmental conservation.
4. The event will feature speakers from various industries, including environmentalists, business leaders, policymakers, and other experts in the field.
5. More detailed information about the schedule, speakers, and how to participate will be shared closer to the event date.

To stay updated and be among the first to receive the latest information, I encourage you to follow our LinkedIn page or sign up for our newsletter at <https://www.earthday2023.org/>.

We're excited to have you on board, and we look forward to working together to make Earth Day 2023 a massive success!

Best regards,
Jo
